data.message:
Hi Eminem!!!
My name is Alex!I'm your big fan!When I started to listen your music was a kid!Now I am 27 years old and I still see that you're the best!Your music helped me a lot in life!For me, music is my life!I also write music and record songs!And your music played a big role in this!She is always in my player!At different points!And when it was good and when it is very bad!There is a lot of irony and humor and this is all you and it's very cool!I'm from Russia!Here an insane amount of your fans!It seems to me that even more than in America!!!I dream to visit America and want to visit on your concert!To say Hello and say man you're insanely cool!Are you doing real music!Cool music!The best music!I hope it happens someday I will go to your concert!Can't imagine a world without your music)It would be a fucking world)) If you find time I would be very glad if you write a message! https://www.facebook.com/mc.lex.1
With great respect!
Alex!
